sections.title: Description
sections.raw_content: The lower attribute is used to find the lower bound of an array, string, char(n) or non-opaque subrange type. Since the lower bound is necessarily known at compile time, lower is rarely used.
sections.text_content: The lower attribute is used to find the lower bound of an array, string, char(n) or non-opaque subrange type. Since the lower bound is necessarily known at compile time, lower is rarely used.
sections.mdown_content: The **lower** attribute is used to find the lower bound of an array, string, **char**(_n_) or non-opaque subrange type. Since the lower bound is necessarily known at compile time, **lower** is rarely used.

sections.title: See also
sections.raw_content: upper which finds the upper bound.
sections.text_content: upper which finds the upper bound.
